dialogue.htmlContent:
While the door before you bears the promising sign 'Bureau of Property and Commerce; Open to the public', someone has stuck a sheet of paper beneath it, which reads:

Transfer of property rights has been suspended until further notice. We expect to have business return to normal once the relevant administrator has filed form 'v0.4.0'.
Sorry for the inconvenience.

Letting out a sigh as you realise that purchasing property within Dominion will remain impossible until this 'v0.4.0' has been completed, you turn around and decide to head elsewhere...
